typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_CITY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STATE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ZIP as string,
		ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		BATCH_ID as string,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STAT as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT SOURCE_KEY,WS_EXT_PH_NAME, WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM, LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,1,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME))) ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME),LEN(FIRST_NAME))) ELSE NULL END AS MIDDLE_NAME,\nWS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,WS_EXT_PH_CITY,WS_EXT_PH_STATE,WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,ZIP_CODE5,WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,CHANGE_CODE,BATCH_ID,\nCOUNTRY_CODE,WS_EXT_PH_STAT,PERSON_CHECK_SUM,PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT A.SOURCE_KEY,A.WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) WS_EXT_PH_NAME, \nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,1,(CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)-1))))\nELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) END AS LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)+1,LEN(A.ws_ext_ph_name)))) \nELSE NULL END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCAST(A.WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date) as WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE, CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 , CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 ,CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 ,\nCASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_CITY END AS WS_EXT_PH_CITY, CASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_STATE END AS WS_EXT_PH_STATE ,\nCASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ZIP END AS WS_EXT_PH_ZIP ,CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5) END AS ZIP_CODE5, UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION) WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,UPPER(A.CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE,UPPER(B.COUNTRY_CODE) COUNTRY_CODE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STAT) WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_NAME,\'1\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,\'3\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+\nISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\'10\')    ),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')),2) PERADDR_CHECK_SUM, batch_id,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.RS_OMNI_VIPS_DAILY_PART_HEADER_DELTA_STG A LEFT JOIN \nCMDM_STAGE.STATE_MASTER B ON UPPER(TRIM(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(B.STATE_CODE))\n) T\n\n',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from CMDM_STAGE.PersonAddress_sample_omni where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\' or sourceSystem=\'VIPS 5.2\' or sourceSystem=\' \'',
	format: 'query') ~> TgtPersonAddress100
source(output(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from CMDM_STAGE.PersonAddress_sample_omni where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\' or sourceSystem=\'VIPS 5.2\'',
	format: 'query') ~> Tgtperson1100
SourceDeleteInd derive(SourceCreateDateTime = 'NULL',
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = 'NULL',
		row_status = 'A',
		Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		lastupdatedby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_UPDT_LOAD',
		createdatatime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_CREATE_LOAD',
		AddressType = 'HOME',
		primaryFlag = 'Y') ~> derivedColumn1
exists4 derive(SourceDeletedInd = 'N') ~> SourceDeleteInd
derivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert
exists2 split(CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE'||CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	disjoint: true) ~> split3@(ifNeworUpdate, elsenew)
split3@ifNeworUpdate, TgtPersonAddress100 exists(PERADDR_CHECK_SUM==check_sum,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> doesntexists1
exists6 derive(Row_Status = 'I',
		LastUpdatedTime = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> updated
split5@if1, TgtPersonAddress100 exists(SOURCE_KEY== srcPersonPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && addressType=='HOME',
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists2
doesntexists1 split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	disjoint: true) ~> split4@(updateI, InsertA)
split4@InsertA derive(SrcDelInd = case(CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE', 'Y','N'),
		RowStatus = 'A',
		LastUpdated_Time = currentTimestamp(),
		lastupdatedby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_UPDT_LOAD',
		createdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_CREATE_LOAD',
		sourcecreatedatetime = 'NULL',
		sourcelastupdatedatetime = 'NULL',
		AddressType = 'HOME',
		primaryflag = 'Y') ~> derivedColumn3
derivedColumn3 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> insert1
source1 split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE',
	disjoint: true) ~> split5@(if1, if2, if3)
split5@if2, TgtPersonAddress100 exists(SOURCE_KEY== srcPersonPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && addressType=='HOME',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists4
TgtPersonAddress100, split4@updateI exists(SOURCE_KEY== srcPersonPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && addressType=='HOME',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists6
Tgtperson1100, split5@if3 exists(check_sum == PERSON_CHECK_SUM && row_status == 'A',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists7
exists7 derive(Srcinddel = 'Y',
		LastUpdatedTm = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn5
derivedColumn5 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> deleteupdate
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		addressType = AddressType,
		addressLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		addressLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		addressLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		cityName = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		stateCD = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		postalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		postalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		srcPersonPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		row_status,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		primaryFlag,
		check_sum = PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		lastUpdatedBy = lastupdatedby,
		createDateTime = createdatatime,
		createdBy = createdby,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		SourceCreateDateTime
	)) ~> PersonAddrInsert
updated sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['batch_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		addressType,
		streetAddress,
		addressLine1,
		addressLine2,
		addressLine3,
		cityName,
		stateCD,
		postalCode,
		poBox,
		mailBoxNumber,
		countryCD,
		postalCode5,
		srcPersonPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		srcAddressPkey,
		primaryFlag,
		batch_id,
		row_status = derivedColumn2@Row_Status,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime,
		lastUpdatedBy,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		countyName
	)) ~> personaddrUpdate
insert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		addressType = AddressType,
		addressLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		addressLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		addressLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		cityName = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		stateCD = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		postalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		postalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		srcPersonPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		row_status = RowStatus,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		primaryFlag = primaryflag,
		check_sum = PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdated_Time,
		lastUpdatedBy = lastupdatedby,
		createDateTime = createdatetime,
		createdBy = createdby,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = sourcelastupdatedatetime,
		SourceCreateDateTime = sourcecreatedatetime
	)) ~> personAddressinsert1
deleteupdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPersonPkey','batch_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 4,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		addressType,
		streetAddress,
		addressLine1,
		addressLine2,
		addressLine3,
		cityName,
		stateCD,
		postalCode,
		poBox,
		mailBoxNumber,
		countryCD,
		postalCode5,
		srcPersonPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		srcAddressPkey,
		primaryFlag,
		row_status,
		batch_id,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime,
		lastUpdatedBy,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		countyName
	)) ~> persondelete
